mapper.insert: insert into replication_applier_configuration (CHANNEL_NAME, DESIRED_DELAY, REQUIRE_ROW_FORMAT, PRIVILEGE_CHECKS_USER) values (#{channelName,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{desiredDelay,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{requireRowFormat,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{privilegeChecksUser,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.select: select CHANNEL_NAME, DESIRED_DELAY, REQUIRE_ROW_FORMAT, PRIVILEGE_CHECKS_USER from replication_applier_configuration
